Title: Enable 2FA Successfully
Steps: Log into the account | Navigate to Security Settings | Click 'Enable 2FA' | Scan the QR code with the authenticator app | Enter a valid 6-digit OTP from the authenticator app
Expected: 2FA should be enabled and a confirmation email should be received

Title: Login with 2FA Enabled Successfully
Steps: Ensure 2FA is enabled on the account | Enter correct email and password | Enter a valid 6-digit OTP within 60 seconds
Expected: User should be logged in successfully

Title: Account Lock After Invalid OTP Attempts
Steps: Navigate to OTP verification page | Enter an invalid OTP three times
Expected: Account should be temporarily locked for 10 minutes and a security alert email should be received

Title: Use Backup Code for Login
Steps: Navigate to OTP verification page | Click 'Use backup code' | Enter a valid backup code
Expected: User should be logged in successfully and the backup code should be marked as used

Title: Disable 2FA Successfully
Steps: Ensure 2FA is enabled | Go to Security Settings | Click 'Disable 2FA' | Enter current password | Enter a valid OTP one last time
Expected: 2FA should be disabled and a confirmation email should be received
